about_the_game:
The demo version allows you to learn the basic mechanics of the game, limiting the gameplay to a larger part of the buildings that can be unlocked.
In the demo version, you can only play the tutorial.
detailed_description:
The demo version allows you to learn the basic mechanics of the game, limiting the gameplay to a larger part of the buildings that can be unlocked.
In the demo version, you can only play the tutorial.
name: FolkOrigin Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: The demo version allows you to learn the basic mechanics of the game, limiting the gameplay to a larger part of the buildings that can be unlocked. In the demo version, you can only play the tutorial.
